description.para: See AtParamValue for the actual primitive data types that these macros refer to.

detaileddescription.para: Undefined, you should never encounter a parameter of this type
Undefined, you should never encounter a parameter of this category

description.para: These macros are to be called from a node's node_parameters method only.
Please refer to ai_params.h for a description of the functions called by these macros.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the parameter that will be installed
the default value of the new parameter (the actual number of arguments passed in depends on the parameter's data type, for example three floats for a RGB type)

detaileddescription.para: Actual parameter value for each supported type
